data.lyric:
[ti:Better Together]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:What You See Is What You Get]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Better Together - Luke Combs
[00:02.27]Lyrics by：Luke Combs/Dan Isbell/Randy Montana
[00:04.55]Composed by：Luke Combs/Dan Isbell/Randy Montana
[00:06.83]A 40 HP Johnson
[00:09.57]On a flat bottom metal boat
[00:13.85]Coke cans and BB guns
[00:16.26]Barbed wire and old fence posts
[00:19.79]8-point bucks in autumn
[00:22.87]And freshly cut corn fields
[00:26.39]One arm out the window
[00:29.59]And one hand on the wheel
[00:31.91]Some things just go better together
[00:36.15]And probably always will
[00:38.45]Like a cup of coffee and a sunrise
[00:42.22]Sunday drives and time to kill
[00:45.27]What's the point of this old guitar
[00:49.11]If it ain't got no strings
[00:52.50]Or pouring your heart into a song
[00:56.06]That you ain't gonna sing
[00:58.46]It's a match made up in heaven
[01:02.22]Like good ole boys and beer
[01:05.51]And me as long as you're right here
[01:15.32]Your license in my wallet
[01:18.98]When we go out downtown
[01:21.97]Your lipstick stained every coffee cup
[01:25.56]That I got in this house
[01:28.76]The way you say I love you too
[01:31.72]Is like rain on an old tin roof
[01:35.24]And your hand fits right in to mine
[01:38.31]Like a needle in a groove
[01:40.80]Some things just go better together
[01:45.25]And probably always will
[01:47.55]Like a cup of coffee and a sunrise
[01:51.26]Sunday drives and time to kill
[01:54.31]What's the point of this old guitar
[01:58.42]If it ain't got no strings
[02:01.58]Or pouring your heart into a song
[02:04.92]That you ain't gonna sing
[02:07.43]It's a match made up in heaven
[02:11.18]Like good ole boys and beer
[02:14.55]And me as long as you're right here
[02:24.21]Sometimes we're oil and water
[02:27.56]But I wouldn't have it any other way
[02:31.23]And if I'm being honest
[02:34.23]Your first and my last name
[02:37.26]Would just sound better together
[02:41.20]And probably always will
[02:43.44]Like a cup of coffee and a sunrise
[02:47.13]Sunday drives and time to kill
[02:50.23]What's the point of this old guitar
[02:54.33]If it ain't got no strings
[02:57.48]Or pouring your heart into a song
[03:00.73]That you ain't gonna sing
[03:03.36]It's a match made up in heaven
[03:07.08]Like good ole boys and beer
[03:10.50]And me as long as you're right here
[03:16.94]And me as long as you're right here
data.trans:
[ti:Better Together]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:What You See Is What You Get]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.27]//
[00:04.55]//
[00:06.83]40匹马力的发动机
[00:09.57]驱动着平底船
[00:13.85]可乐罐和BB枪
[00:16.26]带刺的铁丝网和破旧的篱笆桩
[00:19.79]秋日里四处闲逛的鹿群
[00:22.87]刚刚收获的玉米地
[00:26.39]一只手伸出窗外 感受微风
[00:29.59]另一只手扶着方向盘
[00:31.91]有些事与你在一起会更加美好
[00:36.15]可能会永远如此
[00:38.45]就像喝着咖啡欣赏日出
[00:42.22]周末驾车出游消磨时光一般惬意
[00:45.27]没有琴弦的旧吉他
[00:49.11]变得毫无意义
[00:52.50]即使是扣动你心弦的歌
[00:56.06]只要你不愿歌唱那也毫无意义
[00:58.46]这是天作之合
[01:02.22]就像男子汉和啤酒一样是绝配
[01:05.51]于我而言 只要你在我身边就无与伦比
[01:15.32]当我们驶向市区的时候
[01:18.98]你的驾照放在我的钱包里
[01:21.97]我在家里添置的每一个咖啡杯上
[01:25.56]都留着你的唇印
[01:28.76]你说我也爱你时的语气
[01:31.72]犹如雨滴落在破旧的铁皮屋顶般悦耳动听
[01:35.24]你的手与正合我意
[01:38.31]我们十指紧扣时 严丝合缝
[01:40.80]有些事与你在一起会更加美好
[01:45.25]可能会永远如此
[01:47.55]就像喝着咖啡欣赏日出
[01:51.26]周末驾车出游消磨时光一般惬意
[01:54.31]没有琴弦的旧吉他
[01:58.42]变得毫无意义
[02:01.58]即使是扣动你心弦的歌
[02:04.92]只要你不愿歌唱那也毫无意义
[02:07.43]这是天作之合
[02:11.18]就像男子汉和啤酒一样是绝配
[02:14.55]于我而言 只要你在我身边就无与伦比
[02:24.21]有时我们像油和水一样难以融合
[02:27.56]可我无能为力 找不到其他方法
[02:31.23]如果我坦诚以待
[02:34.23]共结连理 以我之姓冠之你名
[02:37.26]听上去会更美好一点
[02:41.20]可能会永远如此
[02:43.44]就像喝着咖啡欣赏日出
[02:47.13]周末驾车出游消磨时光一般惬意
[02:50.23]没有琴弦的旧吉他
[02:54.33]变得毫无意义
[02:57.48]即使是扣动你心弦的歌
[03:00.73]只要你不愿歌唱那也毫无意义
[03:03.36]这是天作之合
[03:07.08]就像男子汉和啤酒一样是绝配
[03:10.50]于我而言 只要你在我身边就无与伦比
[03:16.94]于我而言 只要你在我身边就无与伦比
